entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -29.4°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: WNW 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
